text: Hessigkofen was a municipality in the district Bucheggberg, in the canton of Solothurn, Switzerland. Since 1 January 2014, Hessigkofen belongs to the new municipality of Buchegg.Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 13 December 2014 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Solothurn
